messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Listen, please. Don't hang up and listen to me. I've been taken out of my house at gunpoint.
What is the address?
Please, I am on the road. He's got me with my kids.
Ma'am, what is the address?
I'm heading to the police department. I was able to escape.
Ma'am, you need to slow down because I don't know where you are. Which police department?
I don't know, please. Hold on.
Hold on one second, ma'am. Just stay on the line.
Plantation Police Department, this is Sunrise with a transfer. It sounds like it's possibly going to be a signal 24, signal zero.
Okay, what's the address?
She doesn't have the address. I'm trying to look it up.
Where is Plantation Police Department?
Tell somebody to intercept me on 6th Street.
What's the problem, ma'am?
He took me out of my shower. I'm on the road now.
Do you know him?
Yes, his name is Carlos.
Is he armed?
Yes, he has a gun.
What kind of car are you in?
He's accelerating on me!
I need you to stay calm. What kind of car are you in?
Plantation, what car are you dispatching?
Stand by, I'm relaying.
Hello Plantation? Shots fired.
Help, he's going to shoot me!
